channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-19463] TezTask - getting groups may fail (PartialGroupNameException in some tests)
item.description:
org.apache.hadoop.security.ShellBasedUnixGroupsMapping$PartialGroupNameException: The user name 'hive_test_user' is not found. id: hive_test_user: no such user
id: hive_test_user: no such user

	at org.apache.hadoop.security.ShellBasedUnixGroupsMapping.resolvePartialGroupNames(ShellBasedUnixGroupsMapping.java:294) ~[hadoop-common-3.1.0.jar:?]

item.summary: TezTask - getting groups may fail (PartialGroupNameException in some tests)

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: prasanth_j can you take a look? a tiny patch.
Last attempt at HiveQA... this patch is pretty safe so I will commit it as is if this also doesn't run.
Can you submit the patch for ptest job to pick it up?

+1 overall
